summary: An email from June 22, 2020, discussing coordination regarding the Victims Fund/Jeffrey Epstein Estate. The sender is seeking clarification on what information is needed, confirming the announcement date, and asking where it will be published.

events.title: Victims Fund Announcement
events.description: Planned announcement regarding the Victims Fund/Jeffrey Epstein Estate, referenced as scheduled for the upcoming Wednesday.

keyFacts: The email discusses coordination for an announcement related to the Victims Fund/Jeffrey Epstein Estate.
The announcement was planned for Wednesday, June 24, 2020 (two days after the email date).
The sender is seeking clarification on whether the request is for a contact, a statement about providing information, or victim services.
The sender asks where the announcement will be published.
